entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
